name: Finger Soccer Game
description:
Finger Soccer Game is a turn-based soccer game. With simple game play and great physics, Finger Soccer Game is easy to pick up 

and fun to play!

You don't need to be master of the soccer game , just drag the ball, adjust power and direction, and kick the ball to the goal.

Features

1. Four game play modes:

- One Player: Play against the computer

- Two Players: Play with your friends

- Tournament: Win the champion by beating your rivals

- Penalty Kicks: Gain the victory by a penalty shoot-out

2. You can select your team from 11 countries with different powers.

3. You can select the team formations from: 1-2-2, 1-3-1, 1-2-1-1, 1-4-0, and 1-1-3.

4. You can select the game time from 3, 5, and 8 minutes.

Try to win as many trophies as you can!
